Actions.Name: Add Entity
Actions.Description: Adds an entity for a certain entity definition like 'M.Brand' - uses dynamic values and outputs dynamic-schema.

Actions.Name: Get Entity By Identifier
Actions.Description: Retrieves a certain entity by its identifier and definition.

Actions.Name: Get FetchJob Status
Actions.Description: Gets the status of a FetchJob.

Actions.Name: List Entities
Actions.Description: Gets entities from a certain entity definition like 'M.Brand' - uses dynamic values and outputs dynamic-schema.

Actions.Name: On Entity Save
Actions.Description: Trigger that executes for every entity save.

Actions.Name: Query Entities (Advanced)
Actions.Description: Queries entities, based on the type of entity (advanced).

Actions.Name: Query Entities (Simple)
Actions.Description: Queries entities, based on the type of entity (simple).

Actions.Name: Update Entity by Identifier
Actions.Description: Updates an entity for a certain entity definition - uses dynamic values and outputs dynamic-schema.
